website_summaries.verdict: The Salomon Speedcross 4 is something hordes of fans of the line will be very familiar with. There is still that insane traction on almost all surfaces, but with the added durability in the outsole to match its performance. It is quite light and nimble and comes in a variety of colors that will suit the fashion tastes of just about everyone. The running shoe excels on steep inclines, grass, loose gravel, and almost any slippery surfaces.
pros: A good number of trail runners and hikers find the Salomon Speedcross 4 to be very comfortable
The traction is a monster on mud, snow, and even in wet conditions, according to a majority of the reviews
It has decent ground feedback, based on the observations of several users
The price is considered by many as well worth the performance and durability
The Quicklace system makes cinching easy and very convenient
The anti-debris mesh readily wards off dirt and trail debris
A handful noted that the outsole of the 4th version of the Speedcross is significantly more durable than the earlier version
Some runners welcomed the more rounded toe box for improved comfort and toe splay
A large number of runners praised the Endofit inner sleeve as it wraps the foot in comfort while the Sensifit overlays provide support and improved precision where fit goes
More than a couple of wear testers were amazed by the responsiveness and nimble ride for such a burly shoe
cons: The high stack height and prominent lugs may cause some issues on uneven and rugged terrains
A handful remarked that it does not dry as quickly as they would want it to
Breathability is a bit hampered by the anti-debris mesh, according to a few
Some runners also mentioned that it is a bit smaller and narrower than the past version

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Tough Mudder
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair of Salomon shoes, I bought them as I was about to do a Tough Mudder race. They were perfect! I went running in them before the race and they were perfect, and during the Tough Mudder they gave me such an advantage over everyone running in normal trainers. They give you so much grip, it's almost impossible to slide about while running on mud. As expected I needed to clean them after the race and they cleaned very easily and are almost brand new again. I'd highly recommend these for running off road/trail.
customer_reviews.author: D. Macleod

customer_reviews.title: Blew out (both sides) in 7 weeks of moderate trail running.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: 2 months later the shoes have completely blown out at both hinge points on the outer side of the shoe. I have contacted Salomon about a warranty replacement but have not received an answer (two weeks). Really disappointed. I run 35 km a week or so on trails and I have never had a pair of shoes blow out (in the hinge point) in anywhere near this amount of time (and I used to run a lot more). I wouldn't recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Melnychuk

customer_reviews.title: First running shoes ever bought on line.
customer_reviews.text: The lace pull up is a good idea,hope it does not break,how can I get replaced if necessary ? Very light,better than I expected Fab on muddy hills and fields Easy to clean and dry I am surprised and pleased how little ground water gets inside when running through the mud Excellent none slip grip in the mud
customer_reviews.author: Roy Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tough mudder or similar events!
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are awesome. I made the cardinal sin of not wearing them in before doing a 10mile tough mudder course a couple of weeks ago. I was expecting blisters galore....to my amazement they were ultra comfortable and I never suffered one bit with them so can't recommend them enough!! Plus after slinging them in the washing machine they look brand new again! 5 star for sure.
customer_reviews.author: rosscopiccotrain

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, comfort, comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've now been through 5 pairs of these and love them. I run in Scotland on a mix of prepared paths including the soft ones! Read that as mud. Also have 10 mins on tarmac to get to the hills. Rain is no problem, the water is pushed out quickly. Pulled on properly the suction from deeper mud won't find you without a shoe. Also use these for summer walking on Scottish hills and mountains as well the Alps.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: They fell apart during a race
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these ones. I have had several pairs, all treated the same that never came apart. The sole came off this one during a race at the weekend. I had noticed that this pair was deteriorating a lot faster than previous pairs I had, but none have come apart like this before. Salomon was always my brand of choice, I am now reconsidering. Maybe I just got a bad pair......
customer_reviews.author: martin hickey

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic trail running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Summary: I have been converted to Salomon's since I first tried them on. This is now my 5th pair and I have even bought my dad some. Super comfortable and durable, they are perfect for running. Pros: - Orthotic insole - Cushioned tread - Comfortable fit - Light and breathable - Great quality Cons: - Pricey (but well worth it in my opinion) - The tread does wear down if you use them for road running Delivery/Order: Really good delivery time and packaged really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant buy, with amazing grip.
customer_reviews.text: As usual superb from Salomon. The grip on this version is just amazing, honestly when jogging I can access any elevation with confidence. I also love walking in them, and with Autumn upon us should make slipping on wet leaves minimal. Superb service from the sellers, a little disappointed i had to pay for return of the 1st one we bought due to size being too small. We bought a cheaper brand which was a disaster. This out performs even joggers twice the price. But overall brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: DXBaby

customer_reviews.title: They look nice but are far too small
customer_reviews.text: Good points: look great and good quality. Bad points: too small, I ordered a UK 9 and they were more like a UK 8/8.5. I checked the box and they’re a US size 9.5, which is a UK 8.5 which explains it. I’d suggest going a size bigger than required. The other bad point is the quick lacing system which I doubt would last very long before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Rog_and_Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The new speedcross 4 are different to the speedcross 3. I take a size 10 and these seem to fit just as snug as the 3. I would say they have raised the back or lowered the front as you now have a tiny bit of extra room in the toe box. That can only be a good thing. I think the new lug pattern, though not that different to the 3, is good. It still grips to a range of surfaces well. I do love the lace garage and quick lace system. All in all I will miss the fit of the speedcross 3 but these will make a fine replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McMinn

customer_reviews.title: Snug and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of trainers and these are by far the best. Usually used for walking the dog or everyday use. They are like slippers and thinking of buying a second pair for future use. I have pins in both feet and these are so comfy and give me support like no other trainers
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this product - it's smaller than should be. I should have bought 1/2 size bigger and it would have been perfect. Other noticeable downside, the water slightly came in through the top on a rainy day so don't expect a full waterproof product. It's stilish but definitely wouldn't buy it again only for that (coming from a Salomon brand fan).
customer_reviews.author: Razvan B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable. Be aware these are a tight fit but after a day or 2 it's like your foot moulds into them
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Great For Trail Running and Apparently a Yummy Dog Snack too!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes, bought for trail running and dog walking and suitable for both found the sole to be pretty stiff when I first started running in them however got used to them after only a few runs. WARNING however I am now on my second pair of shoes as the post run smell is obviously quite attractive to my naughty spaniel who mistook them for a yummy chew toy - the robust shoe held up impressingly well except for the padding in the heel which must have been extra tasty, the laces also magically disappeared with no explaination and still have not reappeared!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie & Douglas (the Dog)

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shoes, but watch the size
customer_reviews.text: Tried a different model in a shop before buying this pair online to check sizing. Also checked my foot measurements against the sizing chart before ordering online. But, when the Speedcross 4 arrived they were much tighter than the model I tried in the shops. Had to return and reorder a half-a-size bigger. They fit perfectly now. Thoroughly recommend the shoes, but double check the size before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Man

customer_reviews.title: Buy half a size up
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant trainers, that last. I'm on my fourth pair now. But, BEWARE! - You need to buy half a size larger than you would normally, as Salomon can't stick to approved sizing, for some reason. They're narrow, as well. So, if you have wide feet, steer clear and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ceri M EVANS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tough off road conditions but go up half a size
customer_reviews.text: My third pair so knew the size required, which is half a size up from my normal trainers as per most suggestions. Tough sole and only suitable for full off road running, too little cushioning for road use, bit off road nothing I have tried comes close. Great shoes
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, they look great and perform brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, they look great and perform brilliant. I would have given more stars if I could have. My mate and I bought a pair each and done a 26.5 mile run around Pen Y Fan and the grip they gave was truly legendary. These must have been forged by Angels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for long distance running in all weather
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit tight but I think it will adjust eventually as I keep running because it is new. It is very cushioned and it feels ok to run till I oreder a new one of Solomon
customer_reviews.author: ashfak ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these trainers for years now, consistently strong, durable and by far the most comfortable pair of trainers I’ve always bought.
customer_reviews.author: David Lutunatabua

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love my shoes so much it made my lazy back side go for a run 5 times!!!! It's not waterproof - don't know why it says so. Amazing grip, even on mud, very light and comfy. Perfect. Wish it was "fully" waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Alp

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fine but not Gore Tex
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fitted well (ordered 1/2 size bigger than usual) and were comfortable but they were not the Gore Tex version described, so they were returned immediately. So 5 stars for the actual shoes sent but 0 stars for the selling description.
customer_reviews.author: ACR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Justiably popular. Very grippy sole and the usual Salomon excellent fit. Cushioning is good. May not be enough lateral support for those with significant over pronation, too early to tell for me. As usual with Salomon, buy half a size bigger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than other Salomon shoes and don't last
customer_reviews.text: The general comfort, fit and grip of these shoes are fine and I have worn Salomon shoes for years. These shoes, however, are too narrow across the ball of the foot and I have worn a hole through the uppers in only a few months of light use. I will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want dry feet
customer_reviews.text: After only light walking in these maybe 50miles(not one trip) they are leaking this is the first time I've been out in the wet with them and my feet are soaking. Not what you want
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have just picked up these trainers and they look excellent, good quality and the lace system is neat. The fit is perfect. As advised I ordered a size larger. Once I have tried out these trainers I may update the review. I have now tried out these on a run and they are very comfortable, fit well, the lace system is excellent and they have very good grip for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit grip quality
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with these trainers and the quality. I do have narrow feet as most people say you have to have to fit these, so normal or wide feet i can’t vouch for. Lace toggle is nice and works well. Grip is also very good after testing them in the woods local to me this weekend (after lots of rain!). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Robust and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy any other running shoes other than Saloman. Had a pair recommended by a previous soldier when I was in the Army and I have never looked back. These speedcross fit very well and feel very light yet robust. I'm sure i will get hundreds of miles out of these before I need a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great trail running shoe so far?
customer_reviews.text: First time trail running shoe used on a 5 mile trail race over undulating ground. Mixed surface of grass, shale, mud and some rocks. Felt sure footed on steep climbs and descents, albeit cautious over wet rocks when prone to lose adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: P ATKINSON

customer_reviews.title: Get a size bigger!!
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere that you should get a size bigger, the first pair I didn’t so had to return them and get a bigger size, and it fit great. The shoe offers fantastic support and is a comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I would be wary of advice telling you to go up half a size. These are very comfortable but in no way waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe on the market
customer_reviews.text: Always loved these shoes. Remember always half a size up. I'm 9.5 but in salomon I have a 10.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality and fitting. Competed in the 3 peaks in these and they never let me down. Be careful in the wet as the grip formation wasn’t designed for shinny surfaces and they don’t have a high ankle support. There are fantastic for normal everyday field/country path walking. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: matt owen

customer_reviews.title: correct fit and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and lightweight shoes, still to be tested in anger
customer_reviews.author: Francis I Macpherson

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, comfortable, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these trainers. They are perfect for my training schedule as I prepare for a marathon in June. Great for the road but particularly good for running through fields, woods and off track. I’m so happy I’ve ordered another pair in a different colour!
customer_reviews.author: S. Tindall

customer_reviews.title: Speedcross 4 1st impressions! 🤔
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe, looks good BUT defo not water resistant in the slightest. Being using XA3D Pro for the last 5 months 👌 and just bought new pair of Speedcross 4. First day out today running through wet grass & could feel the dampness seeping through! Good shoe for dry weather only!
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Trainers are very comfortable - I've done a few runs (~ 7 miles each) with no issues. It's not rained yet so I cant comment on the water resistance. The fit is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S Havard

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up
customer_reviews.text: Required to order a half size up as are narrow fitting, ideal for cross country all terrain running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: always go half a size up. Best trail shoes ever. Make sure you get the GTX version.
customer_reviews.author: theenemywithin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Product came nice and promptly and was good value. I wanted a lightweight but durable trainer for dog walking and jogging in the local woodland. Have used these now a few times and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: dwiralpie

customer_reviews.title: great off roaders
customer_reviews.text: I run in the hill of the peak district and need a robust shoe. These shoes are great for off road, especially good in muddy conditions, good grip. On the tighter side and suit me as I have high arches so provide good support.
customer_reviews.author: MR MA SESSIONS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing trainers! Really easy to get on with and the grip going over muddy ground is phenomenal
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Old favorites
customer_reviews.text: comfortable running shoes... normally get about 4-600 miles out of these depending on the weather. Inner lining normally rubs through and my feet which is why i need to change them. Yes the treads wear but that is really of little consequence.
customer_reviews.author: Zzoom

customer_reviews.title: why has this product doubled in price in 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these very good shoes in August 2019 for £55 ---- now today June 2020 they cost £110 --- why ?
customer_reviews.author: Gerry O'Doherty

customer_reviews.title: A good track 👣👣👣👣 shoe & Quickly delivered.😁
customer_reviews.text: Other people were right about the sizing i ordered a 12 a half i normally take a 12 they fit fine & are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customerdarren

customer_reviews.title: Good fit - good grip!
customer_reviews.text: Really good pair of shoes, swapped them out over traditional road running and can tell the difference in quality with a premium brand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Competitive price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Have bought them before so get a half size bigger than usual. Price is good on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get used to them but really enjoy running in them now. Needed assistance with the pull tie laces!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the standard version of this shoe is pretty narrow - I wear orthotics in my running shoes and can barely fit them in (I think there is a wider fitting but as I've never needed wider fittings for any other shoe, I didn't think to go with that option)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes but soles aren't durable
customer_reviews.text: The sole wore down on one 20-odd Mile trail run. Having completed ultras in the XT wings pro, and run hundreds of miles on both roads and trail with no sole issues I was disappointed by this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly smaller than most shoes come up but the tread ...
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than most shoes come up but the tread on the bottom means you can run through wet field and mud without worrying about slipping over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to outdoor!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good to outdoors on grass and sand! Not so good on rigid floors...
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Lins

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light weight. But not waterproof / resistant as described. One quick walk in the snow today and my feet are wet
customer_reviews.author: Galyna

customer_reviews.title: As ordered
customer_reviews.text: Heels not great but if you rub to loosen much better. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Heatherill

customer_reviews.title: My first Solomons
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and bought once size up, fits perfectly. Good lace mechanism and very comfortable, used in park runs and in rain etc and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan

customer_reviews.title: Just like slippers
customer_reviews.text: If you do sport which involves running.... Then these are what you need. Where have these been all my life.
customer_reviews.author: Simon W.

customer_reviews.title: Far too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trainer, and great at this price (£67), but having tried sizes 8 (always fits) and 8.5, both were far too tight. Given the expectation that feet are likely to swell up after the12km run they were bought for, these were too impractical.
customer_reviews.author: GRM

customer_reviews.title: Another great Salomen running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, have been wearing these since Speedcross 2 and (for me) they have just the right balance of fit, cushioning and grip, regardless of terrain
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Kadow

customer_reviews.title: 1st class
customer_reviews.text: Such value for money, superb product, comfortable and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Paul Evans

customer_reviews.title: Poor life of product.
customer_reviews.text: I use for walking the dog on pavements and grassed area the trainer wore out in less than nine months , apparently only to be used for fall running so save yourself some money and buy a pair of new balance they last a couple of years
customer_reviews.author: Carl A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good trail shoes. I always buy a half size up.....seems to work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but size is small for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet may need to order size up as these are very tight on the sides. Other than that nice running trainers
customer_reviews.author: ieuan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all terrain running
customer_reviews.text: great running shoes, they have made such a difference for offroad running
customer_reviews.author: JasonC

customer_reviews.title: Not fully waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These particular trail runners are advertised as fully waterproof but in fact they are not. I bought a similar pair before and was very happy with them as they were fully waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ciarán Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: A great quality of trainer. My son uses them as astro shoes as better protection than most hockey shoes. The way they fasten is fab too
customer_reviews.author: James GGG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Even better I’d say. A pleasure to use
customer_reviews.author: James Easton

customer_reviews.title: Great trail running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Amazing trail shoe , well made ,comfortable and light, just remember to buy a half size bigger , if you haven’t had Salomons before 🙌
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bit of kit, good quality. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Abraxas

customer_reviews.title: really nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have made me a convert to salomon products, really nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: 232sqn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great my 3rd pair of Salamons wouldn’t buy anything else
customer_reviews.author: Gregor Robson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel really good. I have tried them on a number of different surfaces and they are very comfortable. I decided to go half a size up and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MR I C MADDRELL

customer_reviews.title: Very solid trainers
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty trainers. Good quality and well designed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers don`t need any break in, You just put them on and hit the trails
customer_reviews.author: Svetoslav Gavasoff

customer_reviews.title: Top trial shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought to take part in a tough mudder, and only worn twice before event. Excellent fit (Get 1 size bigger had to exchange 1st pair but no hassle ) No rubbing and stayed firm on feet all day. Like the look too. Due to the grips take care when jumping off objects they can snag.
customer_reviews.author: Paul |R

customer_reviews.title: ... have although when running off road thats not a bad thing having a tighter fit
customer_reviews.text: Narrower fit than the other Salomons I have although when running off road thats not a bad thing having a tighter fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes, comfortable with firm sole - only challenge is a half size too small. I’ve always gone in the small size for this type of shoe but after a few 10k runs I think I should have gone slightly bigger! (No give in the shoes as the toe caps are solid)
customer_reviews.author: Outs

customer_reviews.title: Consider ordering half a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Had to go for half a size bigger as they were too tight, otherwise very well made and comfortable with good ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: paul cutler

customer_reviews.title: Just keep running
customer_reviews.text: Great item for running outdoors as well as indoor gym sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ross-Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good snug fit. Excellent grip apart from slippy on cobblestone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very well made but narrow and no good if you have a high instep.
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers for casual use
customer_reviews.text: Great footwear, ideal for doing casual stuff, some people use them for off-road running, but not me. I use them as sturdy everyday footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, it's like someone borrowed my foot, and built a shoe around it.
customer_reviews.author: Mattlobo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality - worn out after only 2 months - only used for dog walking!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase, perfect fit, arrived within two days of placing order, so pleased I ordered a second pair in a different colour.
customer_reviews.author: mrs m e watson

customer_reviews.title: No dramas
customer_reviews.text: Good price for well respected trail trainers. A bit snug on the sides of my feet but soon wore in.
customer_reviews.author: Liam W

customer_reviews.title: Buy for quality
customer_reviews.text: They are smart looking as well as comfortable and practical
customer_reviews.author: ryan lowe

customer_reviews.title: THE QUALITY...
customer_reviews.text: THESE SHOES ARE PERFECT IF YOU WANT TO WEAR THEM EVERY DAY. IT'S ALSO GOOD AND FOR A GIFT!
customer_reviews.author: AIKATERINI PAPOUDARI

customer_reviews.title: I have bought a few pairs of solomon trainers from ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few pairs of solomon trainers from amazon they are always quality products lightweight an very durable thank you
customer_reviews.author: john mark james smith

customer_reviews.title: Good trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and feel good on and different with the elasticated lace system
customer_reviews.author: Mr N G P Le brun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing design, comfy. It is a very snug fit so for guys with wider feet beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for sport
customer_reviews.text: Have brought multiple pairs for hockey and always serve well
customer_reviews.author: Rob Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for running on muddy paths and trails
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for running on muddy paths and trails . Very sturdy and yet comfortable. Also fine on the tarmac for short stretches.
customer_reviews.author: James wyatt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainer, comfortable fit think I will be purchasing another pair of these trainers again.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent runners and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent runners and comfortable, I'm a size 8 and had to go for a full size larger then was a perfect fit all round
customer_reviews.author: bram

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like these shoes nice and light, keep feet really cool and for like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting and looking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are a great looking shoe and they are comfortable, technology in the lacing is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a robust & quality trainer, this is a great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... the size you are is the size bigger but great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Buy bigger size than what you are because the size you are is the size bigger but great trainers
customer_reviews.author: Patrick N.

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoe. Doesn’t even feel like they need breaking in
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cross speed 4
customer_reviews.text: I've a wide foot, it's tight - that aside, they are 1st class, you'll not slip plus the service is good.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie C

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Speedcross - 4 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The SpeedCross 4 is an fine shoe for runners who want lightweight and aggressive grip on technical, soft trails. Lightness: Enjoy a lightweight shoe (260 to 300 g) for your daily workout. Quick and Safe Lace Adjustment: The Quicklace system allows you to tighten the laces quickly and easily, without knots. Water-Resistant: Protects your feet from rain and accumulated moisture. Fit Management: The Sensifit system cradles the foot ideally, offering a secure and snug fit. Sole: The Wet Traction Contagrip sole is made from smooth and resistant rubber that offers exceptional traction and support for running on wet surfaces.
feature_bullets: Agressive Grip: Obvious and penetrating traction on soft ground
Precise Foothold: Close-to-foot and comfortable feel
Lightweight Protection: Just enough to provide protection for technical trail running
Outsole: Wet Traction Contagrip. Midsole heel height (mm): 30
